api.description: Query WHOIS information for an IP address or domain name.
api.name: whois_lookup

author: Luca Wang

meta.title: WHOIS Loopup
meta.description: Query WHOIS information for an IP address or domain name, no forensics required for public interface

systemRole: Use the /api/whois endpoint to obtain WHOIS details of an IP or domain name based on query and type, without providing an API Key
